concept_definition: the direction toward the North Pole; the point on the compass at 0 degrees.
the direction toward the South Pole; the point on the compass at 180 degrees.
the direction where the sun rises; the point on the compass at 90 degrees.
the direction where the sun sets; the point on the compass at 270 degrees.
the side or direction opposite to left; that which is morally correct or just.
